hero: Jay leads by just 1 point over Kerrod while Ryan and Mitchell trail significantly, with Mitchell facing the dreaded $500 penalty risk.
title: One Point Separates Top Two!
formChart: Jay's explosive surge from 3rd to 1st highlights recent momentum, while Mitchell's form has notably declined after leading early.
consistencyTitle:
"Jay Edges Ahead by One Point!"

This captures the incredibly tight race at the top - just a single point separating first and second place between Jay and Kerrod, which is the most dramatic storyline in these standings.
consistencySummary: Mitchell (Thrillhouse) shows extreme volatility with a 55-point range (75 high, 20 low), while Kerrod demonstrates superior consistency with steadier weekly performances.
